T02TD2656E:309b-3: mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa la //
T02TD2656E:309b-4: brdeg dang bdug dang mtshan ma dgod //
T02TD2656E:309b-5: nang du bcud rnams blugs la yang //
T02TD2656E:309b-6: mgul chings kha rgyan la sogs bcas //
T02TD2656E:309b-7: mandala me tog bcas pa'i steng //
T02TD2656E:309b-8: bzhag la mchod sogs rim bzhin bsham //
T02TD2656E:309b-9: bdag dang gnas sogs bsrung byas la //
T02TD2656E:309b-10: mchod pa bsangs shing byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2656E:309b-11: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsams nas //
T02TD2656E:309b-12: rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod pas //
T02TD2656E:309b-13: bum pa sbyangs te bam las bskyed //
T02TD2656E:309b-14: rgya mtsho padma zla stengs su //
T02TD2656E:309b-15: mi 'khrugs rgyal po spyan drangs la //
T02TD2656E:309b-16: bgegs bskrad rgyas btab mchod yon sogs //
T02TD2656E:309b-17: phul te dza: h'um bam ho: sam dgug / gdan la bzhugs gsol mchod bstod bya //
T02TD2656E:309b-19: brgya stong la sogs ci nus par //
T02TD2656E:309b-20: byas te mchod bstod gtor ma gtang //
T02TD2656E:309b-21: de ltar thung dang sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2656E:309b-22: ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bya //
T02TD2656E:309b-23: khrus kyi dus su bum nang lha //
T02TD2656E:309b-24: mchod bstod byas te mkha' la bzhugs //
T02TD2656E:309b-25: de yis dbang bskur bsams la bkru //
T02TD2656E:309b-26: rang nyid lha yi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD2656E:309b-27: rgyun gcod sngags la che ge mo //
T02TD2656E:309b-28: sarba p'a pam zhes sogs pa'i //
T02TD2656E:309b-29: brjod cing bum pa'i chu rgyun gyis //
T02TD2656E:309b-30: bkru zhing de nas rma bya yi //
T02TD2656E:309b-31: sgro yis byab cing aa pa na //
T02TD2656E:310a-0: zhes sogs brjod pas mi mthun @310a * //
T02TD2656E:310a-2: / bsal bar bsams la slob ma de //
T02TD2656E:310a-3: mdun du gnas pas mandala bya //
T02TD2656E:310a-4: bla ma la phul bla ma yis //
T02TD2656E:310a-5: srung skud srung 'khor gdags pa dang //
T02TD2656E:310a-6: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgyas bsrung //
T02TD2656E:310a-7: lha la mchod bstod bzod par gsol //
T02TD2656E:310a-8: gtor ma byin la phrin las gzhol//
T02TD2656E:310a-9: smon lam btab la gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2656E:310a-10: aa k'a ro yi sngags brjod cing //
T02TD2656E:310a-11: mandala mchod pa me tog bsdu //
T02TD2656E:310a-12: 'di yis yid bzhin nor bu bzhin //
T02TD2656E:310a-14: slob dpon dpa' bo rdo rje mdzad pa'o //
